responsibilities: Work on fixing bugs on the existing system discovered by the clients and QA unit.
Write and test code, refining and rewriting it as necessary and communicate with any programmers involved in the project.
Collaborate with product managers on how to improve and add new features to our already excellent systems.
Develop existing programs by analyzing and identifying areas for modification.

projects.name: Eureka
projects.description: Eureka is a comprehensive web-based project tailored for university students, offering features such as solving past questions, reading lecture notes, and more. The system consists of three main components: Web API, Client Application, and Admin Application.
keyFeatures: Past Question Solver: Enables students to access and solve past questions conveniently.
Lecture Notes Repository: A centralized platform for students to access and study lecture notes.
Generative AI Integration: Empowers administrators to efficiently add questions using generative AI, enhancing the system's content dynamically.
Scalability with Docker: Eureka is designed to be scalable and easily deployable using Docker, ensuring a seamless and efficient deployment process.

projects.name: Mobile Application: Moniepass
projects.description: Protect your online transactions with Moniepass, the leading escrow app in Nigeria. Buy and sell securely, with funds held in escrow until satisfied. Moniepass offers an easy, reliable, and hassle-free experience for users engaging in online transactions. It incorporates real-time communication through SignalR, ensuring seamless interactions, and Firebase notifications for timely updates.
keyFeatures: Escrow System: Safeguarding transactions by holding funds in escrow until the buyer is satisfied.
Real-time Communication: Utilizing SignalR for instant, reliable, and real-time communication between users.
Firebase Notifications: Keeping users informed with timely notifications via Firebase Cloud Messaging.
User-Friendly Interface: Providing an intuitive and seamless experience for buyers and sellers.
Secure Transactions: Implementing industry-standard security measures to ensure the safety of online transactions.

projects.name: Payment Solution
projects.description: The Payment Solution project is a versatile and developer-friendly platform that simplifies payment integration in projects.
keyFeatures: Core Web API: The backend is built using .NET Core Web API, ensuring scalability, performance, and compatibility with a wide range of applications.
Core MVC Admin Interface: The admin interface, developed with .NET Core MVC, offers an intuitive and feature-rich environment for administrators to manage and monitor payment gateways.

The core functionality of this project revolves around exposing different payment gate APIs, facilitating seamless integration into various projects. Developers can easily consume these APIs, saving time and effort in implementing payment functionalities.

projects.name: RapidResponse mobile app
projects.description: RapidResponse is a cross-platform mobile application designed for emergency responders. It provides real-time incident tracking, location-based services, and seamless communication tools to streamline emergency response operations and improve coordination among team members.
keyFeatures: Real-time incident tracking and management
Interactive map interface with incident locations and routing
Live status updates for responders
Push notifications for new incidents and updates
User authentication and profile management
Offline capability with local data synchronization
Background location tracking (when on duty)
Team communication tools

projects.name: ResumeGenius AI
projects.description: ResumeGenius AI is a cross-platform mobile application that leverages artificial intelligence to analyze, enhance, and tailor resumes and cover letters to specific job descriptions. It streamlines the job application process by automating document customization.
keyFeatures: AI-powered resume analysis and data extraction
Job description-based resume customization
Automated cover letter generation
Document import functionality (currently supports PDF/DOC)
Cross-platform compatibility (iOS, Android, Windows, Web)
Local data storage for user privacy
Share functionality for exporting generated documents
Able to import and export resumes in JSON format.

profile: Adaptable and quick to learn new skills. Have initiative and can work independently or as part of a team. Get on well with people at all levels, easily making good working relationships. Energetic, dynamic, and achievement-driven as a result of extremely detesting failure.

certifications.name: Building a RESTful API with ASP.NET core 3
